rows.label: soul07_P0101
rows.name:
I'm taking the first strike!
 Stay close!

rows.label: soul07_P0102
rows.name:
I'm going in! Cover me
 with melee attacks!

rows.label: soul07_P0103
rows.name:
We've got no choice!
 Bring it to 'em!

rows.label: soul07_P0201
rows.name: Open fire! Work as a team!

rows.label: soul07_P0202
rows.name:
Let's play this safe.
 Buff me up!

rows.label: soul07_P0203
rows.name:
I'll attack from range!
 Weaken 'em for me!

rows.label: soul07_P0301
rows.name: I'll take point! Charge!

rows.label: soul07_P0302
rows.name: Don't hold back! Fire!

rows.label: soul07_P0303
rows.name:
Ready to engage!
 Set us up with an aura!

rows.label: soul07_P0401
rows.name:
Sorry, guys! Can someone
 heal me? ...Please?

rows.label: soul07_P0402
rows.name:
No! I'm not giving up yet!
 Help me out!

rows.label: soul07_P0403
rows.name:
I can take this... Buff me up
 and I'll bounce back!

rows.label: soul07_P0501
rows.name:
Somebody needs to
 patch me up here...

rows.label: soul07_P0502
rows.name:
Hey, I need help!
 I'm too young to die!

rows.label: soul07_P0503
rows.name:
I'm not done yet.
 Give me a buff!

rows.label: soul07_P0601
rows.name:
Sorry I couldn't do more...
 Strike back for me...

rows.label: soul07_P0602
rows.name:
It's in your hands now... Keep
 firing and create an opening!

rows.label: soul07_P0603
rows.name:
Is this the end...?
 N-no... Use an aura...

rows.label: soul07_P0701
rows.name:
Not bad! Now close in
 and don't let up!

rows.label: soul07_P0702
rows.name: Attack at range! It's working!

rows.label: soul07_P0703
rows.name: I see a window! Cripple it!

rows.label: soul07_P0801
rows.name:
Now we're talking!
 Bring the fight in close!

rows.label: soul07_P0802
rows.name:
Appendage destroyed!
 Now fire away and topple it!

rows.label: soul07_P0803
rows.name: Yes! Weaken it and attack!

rows.label: soul07_P0901
rows.name:
This thing doesn't want to
 go down... Keep firing!

rows.label: soul07_P0902
rows.name:
We've got a fighting chance,
 but buff us up to be safe!

rows.label: soul07_P0903
rows.name:
They're starting to slow down!
 Push 'em back with Overclock!

rows.label: soul07_P1001
rows.name: Yeah! Now step in!

rows.label: soul07_P1002
rows.name: It worked! Fire away!

rows.label: soul07_P1003
rows.name:
Woooo! That one hurt!
 Now weaken them!

rows.label: soul07_P1101
rows.name: Follow me! Auras up!

rows.label: soul07_P1102
rows.name:
Mix some auras in
 with your attacks!

rows.label: soul07_P1103
rows.name: Buff me up! I need a boost!

rows.label: soul07_P1201
rows.name:
Let's put an end to this.
 Overclock!

rows.label: soul07_P1202
rows.name: Don't be afraid! Overclock!

rows.label: soul07_P1203
rows.name:
Overclock!
 You guys use auras!

rows.label: soul07_C0101
rows.name:
One down!
 Close in on the next!

rows.label: soul07_C0102
rows.name:
Keep going!
 Mow 'em all down!

rows.label: soul07_C0103
rows.name:
There's still more!
 Get yourself buffed up!

rows.label: soul07_C0201
rows.name: Ha! Nice try! Use an aura!

rows.label: soul07_C0202
rows.name:
Saw that one coming!
 Give us some more buffs!

rows.label: soul07_C0203
rows.name:
Ha! You can't hit me!
 Concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul07_C0301
rows.name: Nice! Move in and strike!

rows.label: soul07_C0302
rows.name: They're wide open! Blast 'em!

rows.label: soul07_C0303
rows.name: We've got this. Rush 'em!

rows.label: soul07_C0401
rows.name:
It's just some bad weather!
 Buff up and we'll ride it out!

rows.label: soul07_C0402
rows.name:
This is rough...
 We need auras!

rows.label: soul07_C0403
rows.name:
The enemy's no better off.
 Weaken 'em!

rows.label: soul07_C0501
rows.name: Too slow! Now! Fortify!

rows.label: soul07_C0502
rows.name:
I'll try a new position.
 Buff me up!

rows.label: soul07_C0503
rows.name:
I think I confused them!
 Use Overclock!

rows.label: soul07_C0601
rows.name:
Thanks. Now let's
 close the distance!

rows.label: soul07_C0602
rows.name:
I appreciate it.
 Got your gun ready?

rows.label: soul07_C0603
rows.name: Thanks! Get your auras ready!

rows.label: soul07_C0701
rows.name:
Thank you!
 Mind buffing me up?

rows.label: soul07_C0702
rows.name:
My bad. Can you
 give me a buff?

rows.label: soul07_C0703
rows.name:
Don't worry about me.
 Try an aura!

rows.label: soul07_C0801
rows.name:
I'm still in this. Move in
 and shake things up!

rows.label: soul07_C0802
rows.name:
We can still do this.
 Give me some cover fire!

rows.label: soul07_C0803
rows.name:
I can handle this.
 Just watch my back!

rows.label: soul07_C0901
rows.name:
I've got some elevation!
 Concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul07_C0902
rows.name:
This position should work.
 Fire!

rows.label: soul07_C0903
rows.name:
I'm gonna get the drop
 on them! Open fire!

rows.label: soul07_C1001
rows.name:
There! Hit them with
 melee attacks!

rows.label: soul07_C1002
rows.name:
Now! Blast the snot
 out of them!

rows.label: soul07_C1003
rows.name:
Yeah! Nailed it!
 Now cripple them!

rows.label: soul07_C1101
rows.name:
That stopped 'em!
 Ready to move in?

rows.label: soul07_C1102
rows.name:
They're stunned!
 Concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul07_C1103
rows.name:
Weaken 'em! They can't do
 anything about it!

rows.label: soul07_C1201
rows.name: Nighty-nite! Strike 'em hard!

rows.label: soul07_C1202
rows.name: Out like a light! Blast away!

rows.label: soul07_C1203
rows.name:
No mercy! We can do some
 real damage now!

rows.label: soul07_C1301
rows.name:
I'll restrain 'em!
 Use melee attacks!

rows.label: soul07_C1302
rows.name: I'll hold on, you fire away!

rows.label: soul07_C1303
rows.name:
Nabbed one! Now close in
 and help me out!

rows.label: soul07_C1401
rows.name: Dang... Patch me up, please!

rows.label: soul07_C1402
rows.name: No biggie! Just stay on 'em!

rows.label: soul07_C1403
rows.name: Damage is minor! Keep firing!

rows.label: soul07_C1501
rows.name: Oh no! I need help!

rows.label: soul07_C1502
rows.name:
My Doll's trashed but I can
 still fight. Just buff me up!

rows.label: soul07_C1503
rows.name: I'm okay! Just use Overclock!

rows.label: soul07_C1601
rows.name:
Give me a re-up!
 I'm low on fuel!

rows.label: soul07_C1602
rows.name:
Fuel's running low!
 Somebody set me up!

rows.label: soul07_C1603
rows.name:
I need a refuel before my
 Doll kicks it!
